main.model

Class SpecialAttack

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.model.SpecialAttack

  • public class SpecialAttack
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the various special attacks

      • SpecialAttack

        public SpecialAttack(java.lang.String attackName,
                     int level,
                     int skillCap)
        Default constructor for special attacks
        Parameters:
        attackName - the name of the special attack
        level - player level
        skillCap - the skill cap for the special attack type

      • SpecialAttack

        public SpecialAttack(java.lang.String attackName,
                     int level,
                     Weapon weapon,
                     int skillCap,
                     int arrowDamage,
                     int arrowElemental,
                     int arrowElementType)
        Constructor for Special Attack concerning ranged attacks
        Parameters:
        attackName - the attack name
        level - player level
        weapon - equipped bow
        skillCap - archery skill cap
        arrowDamage - base damage of the arrow equipped
        arrowElemental - elemental damage of the arrow equipped
        arrowElementType - elemental type of the arrow equipped
